availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Isaac Whitehead (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer and cabinet maker)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, farmer and cabinet maker. North Carolina native. Married to Cynthia Ann Whitehead. Father of James N. Whitehead, Mary Whitehead, Jacob Whitehead, Hannah Whitehead, Malvina Whitehead, Lucy Ann Whitehead, and Samuel Whitehead. Farmer in Rockcastle County in 1850. Cabinet maker in Mount Vernon, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Northern District, p. 204; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, p. 26; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Rockcastle County, Voting District 2, p. 2.
